Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.Sign.3: Sendaizaka Hall^^Out of order.^Regrettably, there is no expected opening date.^Please direct hire enquiries to shrine attendants.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.Sign.4: Heritage temple of Sendaizaka Peak^Established 18XX with the help of our gracious donors and patrons.^^Head priest -- Hino Tomo.^Care of Hino family.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.Coop.1: This house is for chickens, not for people.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.Totem.1: The statue looks protective, but your crops beg to differ.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.Temizuya.1: It's a basin of pure water. The wood's showing its age, but the water's still perfectly clean.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.Omiyageya.1: The shopfront's adorned with an assortment of trinkets and talismans.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.1: There's a rice cooker quietly steaming away.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.3: It's a big bowl of delicious jelly doughnuts.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.4: Even Grandpa's run-down house didn't have a kitchen this old... or this messy.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.5: The shelves are stuffed with.. comic books and figurines?
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.6: Looks like an old family heirloom. Better not touch it.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.7: There's stacks of school books on history, culture, archaeology...
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.8: It's a huge pile of silly comics.
Entries.blueberry.Hikawa.House.9: Nothing but trash. Sure are a lot of instant noodle packets in here.
